title: Bioassay-guided fractionation of Verbascum thapsus extract and its combination with polyvinyl alcohol in the form electrospun nanofibrous membrane for efficient wound dressing application
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Sepideh Razani, Mohsen Farhadpour, Manizheh Avatefi Hemmat, Fatemeh Sadat Alamdaran, Masoumeh Fakhr Taha, Hossein Ali Khonakdar, Matin Mahmoudifard
